EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for Attending the Pivotal Big Data Workshop - Atlanta
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for attending the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow. It was a great turnout and we really appreciated your input and participation. We hope you left with fresh ideas and the hands-on knowledge to transform your data infrastructure with Spring HD, Gemfire, Pivotal HD and Pivotal HAWQ in your data environment.
Next Steps:
- Give us your feedback! Please take our short survey <https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/9NBTBSH> so that we can continue to make future workshops informative and relevant. - Review the workshop presentation slides available here <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/big-data-roadshow>. - Public AMI in Amazon for the environment: ami-aaf1dac2 - Access the labs and technical content here <https://github.com/Pivotal-Field-Engineering/BigDataRoadshow-labs> <https://github.com/Pivotal-Field-Engineering/BigDataRoadshow-labs>
Contact us <mailto:info@pivotal.io> to schedule a technical evaluation with our team. Learn how Pivotal Big Data Suite can transform your data-driven organization.
Thank you again for joining us! For upcoming events visit us at <http://pivotal.io/>http://pivotal.io/news-events <http://pivotal.io/news-events>. We are looking forward to seeing soon!
The Pivotal Team
